text:
A Moment of Clarity

<setup: Raskolnikov with family, tense atmosphere>
<optional narration, hidden pain revealed>
Raskolnikov: “I’m almost well now.”  
Pulcheria: “Oh, my dear son!”  
Razumihin: “You’re surprising us today!”  

---  

<setup: Zossimov observing, hopeful tone>
<optional narration, recovery in the air>
Zossimov: “Three or four days more, you’ll be fine!”  
Raskolnikov: “It’s possible, I guess.”  
Zossimov: “Your recovery depends on you!”

**PAGE SUMMARY:** Raskolnikov acknowledges his improvement in health while grappling with underlying emotional turmoil.
